09-02-2009, 08:01 PM #1 Mrs."G" View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Aug 2007 Location Westport, CT Posts 433 New Woman Within Code 30% off entire order *Here's how to redeem your offer:
Place one or more items in your shopping bag. At check-out, type WW36437 in the Promotion Code box, then click Apply. The 30% discount will be applied to your ENTIRE order. Continue shopping or begin checkout.
http://clickserve.cc-dt.com/link/tpl...00000000001052
Restrictions: offer ends midnight EST 09/07/09. Cannot be combined with any other offer, except defer bill. One offer per purchase Does not include shipping and handling or taxes. Not redeemable for cash. Not valid on prior purchases, charges or for the purchase of E-Gift or Gift Cards. Please note: offer does not apply to Halloween Costumes, Home and Kitchen items. This coupon applies to both regular-price and clearance merchandise, which is already reduced up to 80% off.Adjustments will not be processed for previous orders. Last edited by Admin; 09-03-2009 at 06:39 AM . Reply With Quote
